languages.text: "Глупо держать его в клетке. Он мог бы быть более полезен".
"Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."
languages.original_text: "Глупо держать его в клетке. Он мог бы быть более полезен".

traits.locale_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."
"Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."
"Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."
"Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."
"Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

languages.text: “把他关在牢笼里没有意义，他可以为你派上更多用场。”
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: “把他关在牢笼里没有意义，他可以为你派上更多用场。”

languages.text: 「奴を檻に捕らえていても意味がない。もっと役に立つ使い方をしろ」
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: 「奴を檻に捕らえていても意味がない。もっと役に立つ使い方をしろ」

languages.text: «Enjaularlo es un desperdicio. Podría ser mucho más útil».
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: «Enjaularlo es un desperdicio. Podría ser mucho más útil».

languages.text: « Je ne vois pas l'intérêt de le garder enfermé dans une cage. Il pourrait se rendre utile. »
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois pas l'intérêt de le garder enfermé dans une cage. Il pourrait se rendre utile. »

languages.text: "In einem Käfig ist er nutzlos. Er könnte Euch viel dienlicher sein."
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: "In einem Käfig ist er nutzlos. Er könnte Euch viel dienlicher sein."

languages.text: "Onu kafeste tutmak manasız. Daha başka şekillerde işe yarayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Keeping him in a cage is pointless. He could be of so much more use to you."

traits.locale_text: "Onu kafeste tutmak manasız. Çok daha fazla işine yarayabilir."
